name: affint-higherlevel
label: BCI: Affective Intelligence Higher Level FEAT analysis
description: This gear does a higher-level GLM analysis for the Affective Intelligence project.

subjects.description: List of subject codes separated by spaces or 'all' for all subjects

covariates.description: List of behavioral covariates to include in the model as regressors or 'none' for no covariates

exclude.description: List of subjects to exclude separated by spaces or 'none' to exclude none.

task.description: List of tasks separated by spaces, of: emoreg facemotion tom

author: Jonas Kaplan
